# Load Packages
```{r}

library(haven)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggstatsplot)
library(psych)
library(bruceR)
library(ggsci)
library(datasauRus)

```

# First look of descriptive statistics 
```{r}

datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  dplyr::summarize(mean_x    = mean(x),
      mean_y    = mean(y),
      std_dev_x = sd(x),
      std_dev_y = sd(y),
      corr_x_y  = cor(x, y)
    )


```

# Introduce GGplot
```{r}

ggplot(datasaurus_dozen, aes(x = x, y = y, colour = dataset))+
    geom_point()


```
